ethnologue_comment.comment: Anasi [bpo] is listed in E16/E17/E18/E19/E20/E21/E22/E23/E24/E25/E26 as a separate language on the left-hand side of the Lower Mamberamo, but the most detailed survey of this area (**hh:h:Jones:ECenderawasih**:3, cf.~**hh:h:Detiger:Waroppen**) finds Nisa [njs] be spoken at Anasi. The Anasi entry was, in the first place, based on the incomplete information -- just the name and location -- in **hh:hw:Galis:NNG**. See also: Nisa-Anasi [njs].

meds: Peter J. Silzer and Helj√§ Heikkinen-Clouse 1991
